KENT.IS.long_name: Kent Gida Maddeleri Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S.
KENT.IS.summary: Kent Gida Maddeleri Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures candies and sugar lozenges in Turkey. It offers bubble gums, chewing gums, sugarless sweetener chewing gums, jellybeans, candies, chocolates, and biscuits under the Bubblicious, Falim, First, Jelibon, Olips, milka, oreo, Toblerone, Topitop, Missbo, Tofita, Tipitip, Susceptible, and city brands. The company was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Gebze, Turkey. Kent Gida Maddeleri Sanayii ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Cadbury Schweppes Overseas Limited

KRVGD.IS.long_name: Kervan Gida Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S.
KRVGD.IS.summary: Kervan Gida Sanayi Ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi produces and sells candies in Turkey. It provides jellies, licorices, marshmallows, lollipops, gums, and functional products. The company was founded in 1994 is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

OYLUM.IS.summary: Oylum Sinai Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi provides plain and creamy biscuits, waffles, crackers, chocolate waffles, and chocolate bars. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.
